elements.description: 1:register configuration requires execution for changes - 0:nothing to update
elements.name: update

elements.description: 1:board is a bluepill - 0:board is a nucleo-f103rb
elements.name: board

elements.description: 0:i2c address is 7 bit mode - 1:10 i2c address is 10 bit mode
elements.name: addr_10_bit

elements.description: 0:8 bit register access - 1:16 bit register access mode
elements.name: reg_16_bit

elements.description: 0:little endian if 16 bit register access - 1:big endian if 16 bit register access
elements.name: reg_16_big_endian

elements.description: 0:all data will ACK - 1:all data will NACK
elements.name: nack_data

elements.description: Overrun/Underrun: Request for new byte when not ready
elements.name: ovr

elements.description: Bus error:  Non-valid position during a byte transfer
elements.name: berr

elements.description: 0:CK to 0 when idle - 1:CK to 1 when idle
elements.name: cpha

elements.description: 0:the first clock transition is the first data capture edge - 1:the second clock transition is the first data capture edge
elements.name: cpol

elements.description: Sets spi modes since slave cannot repsond immediately - 0:access registers with spi - 1:preloads reg address to 0 for high speed tests - 2:echos SPI bytes - 3:always output user reg 0 (use for timing)
elements.name: if_type

elements.description: 0:8 bit register access - 1:16 bit register access mode
elements.name: reg_16_bit

elements.description: 0:little endian for 16 bit mode - 1:big endian for 16 bit mode
elements.name: reg_16_big_endian

elements.description: SCLK reading at start of frame - 0:sclk line low - 1:sclk line high
elements.name: start_clk

elements.description: SCLK reading at end of frame - 0:sclk line low - 1:sclk line high
elements.name: end_clk

elements.description: 0:echos - 1:echos and adds one - 2:reads application registers - 3:constantly transmits
elements.name: if_type

elements.description: 0:high impedance input - 1:push pull output - 2:open drain output - 3:interrupts and saves event
elements.name: io_type

elements.description: for trace tick divisor - max should be 16 for interface
elements.name: tick_div

elements.description: The io level of the pin - 0:low - 1:high
elements.name: level

records.description: Writable registers for user testing - Starts at 0 and increases 1 each register by default
name: user_reg
